text: The 2019–20 Cruz Azul season is the 60th season in the football club's history and the 56th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. Cruz Azul will compete in Liga MX, Champions League, Supercopa MX, and the Leagues Cup. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:100%; width:35%;" |- ! Position !
